doc.ContractDescription: EP-W-11-003 - NATURAL RESOURCES PROTECTION MOD 0092: THE PURPOSE OF THIS MODIFICATION IS TO REVISE CLAUSE H.19 KEY PERSONNEL (EPAAR 1552.237-72) TO CHANGE THE PROGRAM MANAGER FROM CHERYL KEENAN TO ELENA BESEDIN. THE PURPOSE OF THIS MODIFICATION IS ALSO TO INSTRUCT THE PRIME CONTRACTOR, ABT ASSOCIATES, INC. (ABT), TO NOT INCLUDE CLAUSE H.11 PROJECT EMPLOYEE CONFIDENTIALITY AGREEMENT (PECA)(EPAAR 1552.227-76)(MAY 1994) IN THE SUBCONTRACT TO EPIC FOR THE PARTICULAR WORK TASKED TO THE APPROVED SUBCONTRACTOR (IN ACCORDANCE WITH PARAGRAPH (D) OF THE CLAUSE). THE PURPOSE OF THIS MODIFICATION IS ALSO TO ADD CLAUSE FAR 52.227-14 - RIGHTS IN DATA GENERAL (ALTERNATE IV)(DEC 2007) TO ADDRESS DATA RIGHTS CONCERNING APPROVED SUBCONTRACTOR, EPIC. ALTERNATE IV OF FAR 52.227-14 SHALL ONLY BE USED IN ABT'S SUBCONTRACT WITH EPIC FOR WORK THAT EPIC IS TASKED TO PERFORM UNDER WORK ASSIGNMENT (WA) 4-125. ALTERNATE IV OF FAR 52.227-14 DOES NOT APPLY TO ANY OTHER WORK UNDER THIS CONTRACT, UNLESS THE CONTRACTING OFFICER EXPLICITLY AUTHORIZES ITS USE IN WRITING. CONSISTENT WITH THE CONTRACTING OFFICER'S AUTHORIZATION TO INCLUDE ALTERNATE IV OF FAR 52.227-14 IN THE ABT'S SUBCONTRACT WITH EPIC FOR WORK THAT EPIC WILL BE PERFORMING UNDER WA 4-125, ABT IS FURTHER AUTHORIZED TO NOT FLOW DOWN THE PECA CLAUSE AND ALTERNATE IV OF FAR 52.227-14 IN THE SUBCONTRACT WITH EPIC. MOD 0091: THIS IS AN ADMINISTRATIVE CHANGE NEEDED TO HELP CORRECT PAYMENT ISSUES UNDER THIS CONTRACT. THE PURPOSE OF THIS MODIFICATION IS TO SHIFT FUNDS FROM OPTION PERIOD IV TO BRIDGE 1 OF THE CONTRACT. MOD 0090: APPROVE USE OF SUBCONTRACTOR. MOD 0089: THE PURPOSE OF THIS MODIFICATION IS TO OBLIGATE INCREMENTAL FUNDING TO BRIDGE CONTRACT 2. MOD 0088: THE PURPOSE OF THIS MODIFICATION IS TO: (1) OBLIGATE FUNDING TO BRIDGE CONTRACT 1 AND BRIDGE CONTRACT 2; AND (2) ADJUST FUNDING TOTALS IN BRIDGE CONTRACT 2. MOD 0087: THE PURPOSE OF THIS MODIFICATION IS TO SHIFT $20,000.00 IN FUNDING FROM BRIDGE CONTRACT 1 TO BRIDGE CONTRACT 2. MOD 0086: THE PURPOSE OF THIS MODIFICATION IS TO: EXECUTE A FIVE (5) MONTH BRIDGE CONTRACT EXTENSION TO EP-W-11-003, WHICH INCORPORATES THE CONTRACTOR'S PROPOSAL AND COST ESTIMATE DATED 10 AUGUST 2016; EXTEND THE CONTRACT PERIOD OF PERFORMANCE END DATE FROM 10 SEPTEMBER 2016 TO 10 FEBRUARY 2017; ADD NEW LINE ITEM 0044 WITH THE FOLLOWING CEILING AMOUNTS, ESTIMATED COST CEILING $1,279,967.00, FIXED FEE CEILING $102,397.00, AND LEVEL OF EFFORT CEILING 10,260 HOURS; AND OBLIGATE INCREMENTAL FUNDING TO LINE ITEM 0044 TOTALING $93,000.00. MOD 0085: THE PURPOSE OF THIS MODIFICATION IS TO OBLIGATE INCREMENTAL FUNDING TO THE BRIDGE CONTRACT PERIOD. MOD 0084: THE PURPOSE OF THIS MODIFICATION IS TO : (1) DEOBLIGATE FUNDING FROM OPTION PERIOD IV TO ACCOUNT FOR SCOPE REDUCTIONS TO WORK UNDER WORK ASSIGNMENT 4-111 AND 4-115; AND (2) OBLIGATE INCREMENTAL TO THE BRIDGE CONTRACT PERIOD. MOD 0083: THE PURPOSE OF THIS MODIFICATION IS TO: (1) OBLIGATE INCREMENTAL FUNDING TO THE BRIDGE CONTRACT PERIOD/LINE ITEM 0043; (2) DEOBLIGATE FUNDING FROM OPTION PERIOD IV/LINE ITEM 0041 AND THE BRIDGE CONTRACT PERIOD/LINE ITEM 0043 FOR WORK THAT HAS BEEN STOPPED. MOD 0082: THIS BILATERAL MODIFICATION IS BEING ISSUED TO INCORPORATE INTO CONTRACT EP-W-11-003 THE TERMS OF THE CONFIDENTIAL SETTLEMENT AGREEMENT CONSISTING OF EIGHT (8) TYPED PAGES, WHICH WAS ENTERED INTO BY ABT ASSOCIATES INC, BY AND THROUGH ITS VICE PRESIDENT AND GENERAL COUNSEL, BRIAN ROEMER, AND THE UNITED STATES ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION AGENCY, BY AND THROUGH ITS CONTRACTING OFFICERS SHEILA FAGAN, NATALIA FISHER-JACKSON, STEFAN MARTIYAN, GENINE MCELROY, CHRISTINE EDWARDS, AND NOELLE MILLS, EFFECTIVE (ENTER THE DATE OF THE LAST SIGNATURE ON THE SETTLEMENT AGREEMENT), AS SET FORTH ON PAGES 3 THROUGH 10 OF THIS MODIFICATION. PRIOR YEAR FUNDS BEING OBLIGATED TO FUND THE CONFIDENTIAL SETTLEMENT AGREEMENT WILL BE PAID FROM THE FOLLOWING ACCOUNTING LINE FROM OPTION PERIOD IV OF THE CONTRACT: 14-15-
IGF::OT::IGF FOR OTHER FUNCTIONS - NATIONAL SHREDDING CONTRACT
